title: Onboarding
custom_preconds: Given the user installs the MLB app on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user first launches the MLB app
and sets a team to "My Teams"
custom_expected:
Then the user is able to subscribe/unsubscribe to MLB News and Team specific notifications:

Game Start
Lead Change
Score Change
Pitching Change
Game End
Condensed Game
In-Game Video Highlights
News

title: App Settings > My Teams
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When the user opens the MLB app
and sets Favorite and Followed teams
and navs to app Settings > Notifications
custom_expected:
Then the Favorite and Followed Teams will be listed after MLB News
and the rest of the Teams will be listed in alphabetical order

title: App Settings > Lite User
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed on an iOS device
custom_steps: When a Lite User goes into the app settings and taps on Notifications
custom_expected: Then the user is taken to the Push Notifications screen and they can enable and disable any and all notifications

title: App Settings > Paid User
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed on an iOS device
custom_steps:
When a user opens the MLB app
and logs in with Paid Account
and navs to the app Settings > Notifications
custom_expected: Then the user us taken to the Push Notifications screen and they can enable and disable any and all notifications

title: App Settings > Enable/Disable
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed on an iOS device
custom_steps: When a user is on the Notification screen and disables or enables a notification
custom_expected: Then the notifications will enter the proper state

title: App Settings > Enable All
custom_preconds: * MLB app is installed on an iOS device
custom_steps:
Given the user is on the notification screen
When the user selects "Enable All"
custom_expected: Then all of the options below will toggle to the right subsequently turning on notifications for all options

title: Notifications -> Team Branding -> Team Logo Shows Upon Push Notification
custom_preconds: * User has push notifications enabled for a specific team
custom_steps:
Given a user is subscribed to a specific team 
When a push notification is sent to team news channel
custom_expected: Then the team logo will be present in the push notification

title: Notifications -> Settings Enabled
custom_preconds: Reference: https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/ARC-481
custom_steps:
Given the user navigates to settings > account > notifications
And taps any favorite team or followed team
When the user enables or disable any notifications from the list
And then taps enable all on top
custom_expected: Then notifications get enabled once enable all button is tapped

title: Add MLB logo to editorial push notifications
custom_preconds:
Given a device is subscribed to MLB News notifications.
And the user has not changed the app icon to a specific team
custom_steps: When a league-based push notification is sent with tid=mlbxxx (MLB News).
custom_expected: Then the push notification displays on the device with the app icon on the left and MLB logo to the right of the notification text.

title: Add MLB logo to editorial push notifications (user changed app icon)
custom_preconds:
Given a device is subscribed to MLB News notifications.
And the user has changed the app icon to a specific team
custom_steps: When a league-based push notification is sent with tid=mlbxxx (MLB News).
custom_expected: Then the push notification displays on the device with the app icon (whichever team logo the user selected) on the left and MLB logo to the right of the notification text.

title: Player Notification -> Followed Player Is On Deck
custom_preconds:
* User has the latest app build installed
* User is following a player(s).
custom_steps:
GIVEN an User is subscribed to this notification channel for a followed player

WHEN that followed player is on deck (coming up to bat next)
custom_expected: THEN a push notification should be sent to the subscribed User

title: Player Notification -> Trigger Logic
custom_preconds:
* User has the latest app build installed
* User is following a player(s).
custom_steps:
GIVEN that this notification channel is enabled for a followed player
When  the followed player has a player event occur (a big hit or big play).  Please refer to this list below as trigger events: 

* Pickoff 1B
* Pickoff 2B
* Pickoff 3B
* Pitcher Step Off
* Pickoff Error 1B
* Pickoff Error 2B
* Pickoff Error 3B
* Batter Timeout
* Mound Visit
* No Pitch
* Single
* Double
* Triple
* Home Run
* Double Play
* Field Error
* Error
* Field Out
* Fielders Choice
* Fielders Choice Out
* Forceout
* Grounded Into DP
* Grounded Into TP
* Strike Out
* Strikeout Double Play
* Triple Play
* Sac Fly
* Catcher Interference
* Batter Interference
* Fielder Interference
* Runner Interference
* Fan Interference
* Batter Turn
* Ejection
* Cs Double Play
* Defensive Indiff
* Sac Fly Double Play
* Sac Bunt
* Sac Bunt Double Play
* Walk
* Intent Walk
* Hit By Pitch
* Injury
* Official Scorer Ruling Pending
* Official Scorer Ruling Pending
* At Bat Start
* Passed Ball
* Other Advance
* Runner Double Play
* Runner Placed On Base
* Pitching Substitution
* Offensive Substitution
* Defensive Switch
* Umpire Substitution
* Pitcher Switch
* Game Advisory
* Stolen Base
* Stolen Base 2B
* Stolen Base 3B
* Stolen Base Home
* Caught Stealing
* Defensive Sub
* Pickoff 
* Balk
* Disengagement Violation
* Wild Pitch
* Runner Out
custom_expected: Then the user will be presented with a notification with a link to the highlight of said play

title: Player Notification -> Routing Logic
custom_preconds:
* User has the latest app build installed 
* User is following a player(s).
custom_steps:
GIVEN that the notification has been sent

WHEN a user taps on it
custom_expected: THEN open the attached video clip as a deep link within the app

title: Player Notification -> Routing to GameDay
custom_preconds:
* User has the latest app build installed 
* User is following a player(s).
custom_steps:
GIVEN an User (paid or free) is subscribed to this notification channel for a followed player

WHEN the User tap on that notification
custom_expected: THEN the User will be brought to the Gameday experience for the Game that the followed player is currently playing in

title: Player Notification -> Followed Player Leads Off Half Inning
custom_preconds:
* User has the latest app build installed
* User is following a player(s).
custom_steps:
GIVEN an User's followed player is leading off an upcoming half inning (e.g. top of the 3d)
WHEN the prior half inning ends (e.g. bottom of the second)
custom_expected: THEN send the on-deck notification on the prior half inning ending

title: Player Notification -> Notification's Text Copy
custom_preconds:
* User has the latest app build installed
* User is following a player(s).
custom_steps:
GIVEN an User is subscribed to this notification channel for a followed player

WHEN that followed player is on deck (coming up to bat next)
custom_expected:
THEN a push notification should be sent to the subscribed User
AND the Notification should contain the following text: "[Followed Player's Name] is on deck, tap to follow their at bat"

title: Player Notifications-> Story Recap -> Timing of Push
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user is subscribed to this push channel for a followed player
WHEN it is 9am EST the morning after a followed player was active (meaning they were in the starting lineup or came into the game at some point) in the most recent game played game 
AND there is a player recap story available for them
THEN send the notification out to all users subscribed to this channel for this player with the player story attached

title: Player Notifications-> Story Recap ->  Routing Behavior
custom_steps:
GIVEN that a player recap story is available for a given player

WHEN the notification is sent and a user taps on it

THEN they will be deep linked to the recap story in the app

title: Player Notifications -> Story Recap -> Player active in most recent game
custom_steps:
GIVEN that a player is being followed

AND player plays in the most recent game

AND there is a story recap for that player

THEN user should receive notifications of this player

title: Player Notifications -> Key Highlights -> Receiving to Watching the highlight
custom_preconds:
*User should have the MLB app installed
*User should be following at least one Player
*User should have the Notifications enabled
*The followed Player(s) should have the Key Highlights notification enabled
*The followed Player(s) should have been involved in a good play (deemed a highlight)
custom_steps:
GIVEN the "Key Highlight" play occurs
WHEN the user receives a Key Highlight push notification
AND 15 mins have passed 
AND the notification contains the text: "Here's a highlight for [Name of the Followed Player] Tap to watch the gameplay video"
AND the user taps on the Key Highlight notification
custom_expected:
THEN the user should be taken to the correspondent Key Highlight Video
AND the video should contain the Play deemed to be a Key Highlight.

title: App Upgrade
custom_preconds: Given an older version of MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user changes their MLB app notification settings (to be different than the default options)
and then upgrades to a newer version of the MLB app
custom_expected: Then the updated notifications settings should be carried over to the newer app version

title: Disabling Notifications
custom_preconds: Given an older version of MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user turns off the MLB News notification setting
and then upgrades to a newer MLB app version
custom_expected: Then MLB News should be turned off in notification settings in the newer MLB app version

title: Disabling Default Team Notifications
custom_preconds: Given an older version of MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user turns off any of the default TEAM notification settings
and then upgrades to a newer MLB app version
custom_expected: Then those team settings should be turned off in notification settings in the newer MLB app version

title: Enabling Non-Default Team Notifications
custom_preconds: Given an older version of MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When the user turns on any of the the non-default TEAM notification settings
and then upgrades to a newer MLB app version
custom_expected: Then those team settings should be turned on in notification settings in the newer MLB app version

title: Game Start - Collapsed
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an iPhone
and has the MLB app installed
and notifications enabled
custom_steps: When a user receives a Game Start notification
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the probable pitchers and stats.

Example:
WSH vs. ATL about to start
Pitching: Lester (WSH) vs. Smyly (ATL)

title: Lead Change - Collapsed
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an iPhone
and has the MLB app installed
and notifications enabled
custom_steps: When a user receives a Lead Change notification
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the lead change information

Example:
David Ortiz homers in the bottom of the 5th, Dustin Pedroia scores. The Red Sox now lead the Yankees, 4-2.

title: Scoring Play - Collapsed
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an iPhone
and has the MLB app installed
and notifications enabled
custom_steps: When a user receives a Score Change notification
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the score change information

Example:

David Ortiz homers in the bottom of the 5th, Dustin Pedroia scores. The Red Sox extend their lead over the Yankees, 6-2.

title: Pitching Change - Collapsed
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an iPhone
and has the MLB app installed
and notifications enabled
custom_steps: When a user receives a Pitching Change notification
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the pitching change information.

Example:

Brad Ziegler (3.15 ERA) relieves Rick Porcello (8.1 IP, 103 pitches) in the 9th. The Red Sox lead the Yankees, 4-2.

title: Game End - Collapsed
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an iPhone 
and has the MLB app installed
and notifications enabled
custom_steps: When a user receives a Game End notification
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the game wrap information.

Example:
The Marlins beat the Nationals, 8-6, WP: Paul Campbell(2-3), LP: Kyle Finnegan(5-7).

title: In-Game Video Highlights - Collapsed
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an iPhone 
and has the MLB app installed
and notifications enabled
custom_steps: When a user receives an In-Game Video Highlight notification

title: In-Game Video Highlights - Expanded
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an iPhone with 3D Touch
and has the MLB app installed
and notifications enabled
custom_steps:
When a user receives a In-Game Video Highlights notification
and the video shareable flag is not set
and long presses the notification
custom_expected: Then the user will see the following from top to bottom

custom_steps_separated.content:
Video thumbnail
Play button
Headline
Duration (MM:SS)

custom_steps_separated.expected: and tapping will bring the user to Gameday for the game

title: In-Game Video Highlights - Expanded (Lite User)
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an iPhone with 3D Touch
and has the MLB app installed
and notifications enabled
and user is a Lite user
custom_steps:
When a user receives a In-Game Video Highlights notification
and long presses the notification
custom_expected: Then the user will see the following from top to bottom

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then a pre-roll add will play before the video

custom_steps_separated.content:
Video thumbnail
Play button
Headline
Duration (MM:SS)

custom_steps_separated.expected: and tapping will open the Share sheet
and tapping will bring the user to Gameday for the game

title: Player Notification -> Key Highlights -> Receiving the push notification
custom_preconds:
*User should have the MLB app installed
*User should be following at least one Player
*User should have the Notifications enabled
*The followed Player(s) should have the Key Highlights notification enabled
*The followed Player(s) should have been involved in a good play (deemed a highlight)
custom_steps: WHEN the "Key Highlight" play occurs, the user should be receiving a Key Highlight push notification in the next 15 mins.
custom_expected: THEN the notification should contain the text: "Here's a highlight for [Name of the Followed Player] Tap to watch the gameplay video"

title: Condensed Game - Collapsed
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an iPhone 
and has the MLB app installed
and notifications enabled
custom_steps: When a user receives a Condensed Game notification

title: Condensed Game - Expanded
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an iPhone with 3D Touch
and has the MLB app installed
and notifications enabled
custom_steps:
When a user receives a Condensed Game notification
and long presses the notification
custom_expected: Then the user will see the following from top to bottom

custom_steps_separated.content:
Video thumbnail
Play button
Headline
Duration (MM:SS)
Button for Watch in MLB app

custom_steps_separated.expected: and tapping will bring the user to Gameday Wrap for the game

title: MLB News - Collapsed
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an iPhone
and has the MLB app installed
and notifications enabled
custom_steps: When a user receives an MLB News notification
custom_expected:
Then the user will see MLB News then the editorial content
and a MLB logo

Example:

Title: MLB News
Body: {editorial content}

custom_preconds:

title: Receiving Notification
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed on an iPhone
and the user is subscribed to push notifications
custom_steps: When a user receives a notification and swipes the notification upward or waits five seconds
custom_expected: Then the notification will be dismissed

title: In-App Notification - Sounds
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is subscribed to the app's push notifications
and has sounds enabled on the phone
custom_steps:
When the user is actively in the MLB app 
and receives a push notification
custom_expected: Then the push notification will not make a sound

title: In-App Notification - Notification Center
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is subscribed to the app's push notifications
custom_steps:
When the user is actively in the MLB app 
and receives a push notification
but does not tap to launch it
custom_expected:
Then the user will see a system-based notification
and the notification will be available in the Notification Center

title: In-App Notification - Gameday/MLB.TV feed
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is subscribed to a team's Gameday push notifications
and the team has a game in progress
custom_steps:
When the user is watching that team's MLB.TV feed 
and a play happens in that game, for which the user would have received a Gameday push notification
(scoring play, lead change, pitching change, etc)
custom_expected: Then the user should not receive that push notification

title: In-App Notification - Gameday/MLB.TV/Picture-in-Picture
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is subscribed to a team's Gameday push notifications
and the team has a game in progress
custom_steps:
When the user is watching that team's MLB.TV feed in Picture in Picture
and a play happens in that game, for which the user would have received a Gameday push notification
(scoring play, lead change, pitching change, etc)
custom_expected: Then the user should not receive that push notification

title: In-App Notification - Gameday/Hide Scores
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is subscribed to a team's Gameday push notifications
and the team has a game in progress
and has Hide Scores enabled
custom_steps:
When the user is actively in the app
and a play happens in a game, for which the user would have received a Gameday push notification
custom_expected: Then the user should not receive any Gameday push notification

title: Lite User > Video Notifications
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed on an iPhone
and the user is subscribed to push notifications
and the user is a Lite user
custom_steps:
When the Lite user receives a video push notification
(could be News, In-Game Video Highlights, or Condensed Game)
and the user taps to launch the notification
custom_expected:
Then the app will launch
and a pre-roll ad will play before the video

title: MLB News
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is subscribed to MLB News push notifications
custom_steps:
When the user receives an MLB News push notification
while the user is in the MLB app
and the notification appears
and the user taps to launch it
custom_expected: Then the news article should launch in a webview

title: Team News
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is subscribed to a Team's News push notifications
custom_steps:
When the user receives a Team's News push notification
while the user is in the MLB app
and the notification appears
and the user taps to launch it
custom_expected: Then the news article should launch in a webview

title: MLB News (Video)
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is subscribed to MLB News push notifications
custom_steps:
When the user receives an MLB News push notification of a video
while the user is in the MLB app
and the notification appears
and the user taps to launch it
custom_expected: Then the video should launch in the app

title: Team News (Video)
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is subscribed to a Team's News push notifications
custom_steps:
When the user receives a Team's News push notification of a video
while the user is in the MLB app
and the notification appears
and the user taps to launch it
custom_expected: Then the video should launch in the app

title: Gameday
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is subscribed to Gameday push notifications for a team
custom_steps:
When the user receives a Gameday push notification
while the user is in the MLB app
and the notification appears
and the user taps to launch it
custom_expected: Then the user will be taken to that game's native Gameday view in the app

title: App in Background
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is subscribed to the app's push notifications
custom_steps:
When the user receives an MLB push notification
and the user taps to launch it from the device's Notification Center
while the app is backgrounded
custom_expected: Then the push notification content will launch in the app appropriately

title: App Killed
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is subscribed to the app's push notifications
custom_steps:
When the user receives an MLB push notification
and the user taps to launch it from the device's Notification Center
while the app is killed
custom_expected: Then the push notification content will launch in the app appropriately

title: In-App
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is subscribed to the app's push notifications
custom_steps:
When the user receives an MLB push notification
and the user taps to launch it from the device's Notification Center
while the user is actively in the app
(swipe down from top of device while in the app)
custom_expected: Then the push notification content will launch in the app appropriately
